title: Top 10 trending phones of week 46
description: The Samsung Galaxy A55 got yet another victory in the week 47 edition of our trending chart. Along with the Galaxy S24 Ultra in second and the Redmi Note 13 Pro in third they give us yet another instance of the most popular podium of the year. [#InlinePriceWidget, 12824, 1#] In fourth, however, we have a brand new face - the just announced Redmi Magic 10 Pro+. The gaming beast is clearly turning a few heads. Note 13 follows in fifth as the Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max climbed to sixth position. Xiaomi 15 Pro slid to seventh, while the Galaxy A15 retained its eight...
excerpt: A bunch of familiar names on the podium, but a fresh new face in fourth. The Samsung Galaxy A55 got yet another victory in the week 47 edition of our...

Xiaomi 15 Pro slid to seventh, while the Galaxy A15 retained its eight position. The OnePlus 13 got the ninth spot as the Galaxy A35 made a return to capture the final points-paying position.
html:
The Samsung Galaxy A55 got yet another victory in the week 47 edition of our trending chart. Along with the Galaxy S24 Ultra in second and the Redmi Note 13 Pro in third they give us yet another instance of the most popular podium of the year.

Samsung Galaxy A55

These are the best offers from our affiliate partners. We may get a commission from qualifying sales.
128GB 8GB RAM$ 298.95C$ 416.00
256GB 8GB RAM$ 329.00C$ 479.00
Show all prices

In fourth, however, we have a brand new face - the just announced Redmi Magic 10 Pro+. The gaming beast is clearly turning a few heads.

Note 13 follows in fifth as the Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max climbed to sixth position.

Xiaomi 15 Pro slid to seventh, while the Galaxy A15 retained its eight position.

The OnePlus 13 got the ninth spot as the Galaxy A35 made a return to capture the final points-paying position.
